Header.nativeAppBeforeLogin.Content: IGT Sportsbook requires you to install the app before placing any bets.
BetSlip.placement.error.LIFEDEP: You have reached your lifetime deposit threshold of $ 2500 and therefore you cannot bet until you confirm that you have been notified.
softGeolocationRedirect.infoMessage.Text: It looks like you're in West Virginia. If this is correct, continue to get started.
hardGeolocationRedirect.infoMessage.Fail: It looks like you're in New Jersey. If this is correct, continue to get started.
It looks like you're in Iowa. If this is correct, continue to get started.
It looks like you're in Nevada. If this is correct, continue to get started.
It looks like you're not in West Virginia. If this is correct, continue to get redirected to New Jersey website.
Header.nativeAppBeforeLoginandroid.Conte: IGT Sportsbook requires you to install the app before placing any wagers.
Header.nativeAppBeforeLoginios.Content: IGT Sportsbook requires you to install the app before placing any wagers.
Header.nativeAppAfterLogin.Content: You are now logged into Sportsbook; however, you cannot make wagers unless you download the app
appInstaller.s2.step2: Pull down your notification panel from the top screen and tap on IGT Sportsbook app.
appInstaller.nativeAppios.shouldDwn: You may still use the Website to browse and track active or settled bets; however, if you want to place wagers or Cash Out then download the app and be located in NJ to play.
Transaction.OnePay.Desc: Deposit funds from One Pay to Sportsbook
Transaction.Sightline.Withdraw.Descripti: Withdraw funds from IGT Sportsbook to Play+
Transaction.Sightline.Deposit.Descriptio: Deposit funds from Play+ to IGT Sportsbook
Transaction.Sightline.Funding.Note1:
• Step 1: Click Fund Play+ to add funds to your Play+ account with a Credit or Debit Card, Pay With My Bank, or PayPal.
  • Step 2: Transfer from Play+ to IGT Sportsbook by clicking Deposit in the Cashier.
